T02D2269:106b-1: k'a ya kosh'a ma ri ta badzra g'i ti /
T02D2269:106b-3: sku'i mdzod 'chi med rdo rje'i glu /
T02D2269:106b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2269:106b-5: kye ho bdag dang byed par 'dzin pa ral pa can //
T02D2269:106b-6: bram ze gcer bu sad ga pa dang ni //
T02D2269:106b-7: kho na nyid bzhi 'dod pa'i rgyang phan pa //
T02D2269:106b-8: thams cad mkhyen zhes zer nas rang ma rig / des ni slu bar 'ong ste thar lam ring //
T02D2269:106b-9: bye brag pa dang mdo sde sngags pa dang //
T02D2269:106b-10: rnal 'byor pa dang dbu ma la sogs te //
T02D2269:106b-11: gcig la gcig skyon 'grel zhing rtsod par byed //
T02D2269:106b-12: snang stong mkha' mnyam de nyid mi shes pa //
T02D2269:106b-13: lhan cig skyes la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur //
T02D2269:106b-14: sku gsung thugs gsal mar mer ras dang mar nag bzhin //
T02D2269:106b-15: kho na nyid ldan rang snang mar me lta bur gsal //
T02D2269:106b-16: rang rig gsal bas 'gro ba kun la khyab //
T02D2269:106b-17: dbyer med tshul gyis ma skyes pa yi rang bzhin yin //
T02D2269:106b-18: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis dran pa sna tshogs rgyu //
T02D2269:107a-0: ngo bo nyid la snang tshul cir yang @107a * //
T02D2269:107a-2: / mun pa lta bu'i bag la kun gnas kyang //
T02D2269:107a-3: de nyid rnyed pa'i rnal 'byor sgron me 'bar //
T02D2269:107a-4: snying po'i don ni rtog ge'i yul las 'das //
T02D2269:107a-5: mngon du mi gsal dran pa'i mthu yis bsgribs //
T02D2269:107a-6: rtog med des shes dran med bde ba'i lam //
T02D2269:107a-7: bgrod med 'bras bu blo las 'das par snang //
T02D2269:107a-8: lhan cig skyes pa thugs kyi gter mdzod nas //
T02D2269:107a-9: dag dang ma dag 'khor 'das gzugs su snang //
T02D2269:107a-10: snang yang skye ba med pa'i ngang du gcig / de nyid mi g-yo tha snyad rang bzhin med //
T02D2269:107a-11: phyag rgya chen po 'gyur med bde chen dang //
T02D2269:107a-12: rgyu la mi ltos 'bras bu blo las 'das //
T02D2269:107a-13: phyag rgya chen po rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu yin //
T02D2269:107a-14: tha snyad lam gyi don la mtshon te sbyar //
T02D2269:107a-15: brjod bya rjod byed med pa snying po'i don //
T02D2269:107a-16: kun gyi brjod bya dran med rig pa'i dbyings //
T02D2269:107a-17: mos pa'i shes pas rtogs pa tha dad kyang //
T02D2269:107a-18: dran med 'di la brdzun pa yod re skan //
T02D2269:107a-19: lam gyi rtsol bas 'bras bu so so yang //
T02D2269:107a-20: dran pa 'di la bden pa yod re skan //
T02D2269:107a-21: btang snyoms dbang gis re 'jog tha dad kyang //
T02D2269:107a-22: skye med 'di la gnyis su yod re skan //
T02D2269:107a-23: yid la bya dang mi bya snyad 'dogs kyang //
T02D2269:107a-24: blo 'das 'di la btsal du yod re skan //
T02D2269:107a-25: snang ba'i rkyen gyis dran pa skye 'gyur yang //
T02D2269:107a-26: stong pa'i dran med rkyen las 'da' ba med //
T02D2269:107a-27: rtog med don la bya bral blta ru med //
T02D2269:107a-28: rang la gzhan nas tshol ba aa re 'khrul //
T02D2269:107a-29: kye ho rdo rje lta bur rtogs dka' kho na nyid //
T02D2269:107a-30: ma shes rtsol bas sgra phyir 'brang sems kyis //
T02D2269:107a-31: bya ba med pa'i don dang phrad par dka' //
T02D2269:107a-32: bya ba'i rang bzhin mi bya shes gyur na //
T02D2269:107a-33: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa nyag gcig yul las 'das //
T02D2269:107a-34: sku ni mi 'gyur chos nyid khong stong lags //
T02D2269:107a-35: lus la mi gnas bya dang byed pa bral //
T02D2269:107a-36: lam bslad lam gyi 'bras bu mthong mi 'gyur //
T02D2269:107a-37: skye med dang la mi 'byed rgyal ba'i thugs //
T02D2269:107a-38: dran med dang la mnyam gzhag bde ba che //
T02D2269:107a-39: bde chen dang la mi rtog rgyun la gnas //
T02D2269:107b-0: yid la mi byed snang ba rang @107b sar dag
T02D2269:107b-1: / rkyen ni dran pa ma 'gag ye shes gsal
T02D2269:107b-2: // rtsa ba gcig rgyas skyon med padma bzhin //
T02D2269:107b-3: 'gro ba kun la lhan cig skyes bzhin gnas //
T02D2269:107b-4: gzhan yod long mthong stobs kyis bslad mod kyang //
T02D2269:107b-5: ji bzhin thog ma'i padma me tog bzhin //
T02D2269:107b-6: legs mthong stobs kyi phyag rgya che mi g-yo //
T02D2269:107b-7: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog mas bslad gyur kyang //
T02D2269:107b-8: dus gsum 'gyur med rtsa ba bdag nyid che //
T02D2269:107b-9: rnam shes rlung dang 'og sgo sngags la sogs //
T02D2269:107b-10: ye nas spyod bral rang gzhan btang gzhag bral //
T02D2269:107b-11: 'khor bar mi sems mya ngan 'das mi ltos //
T02D2269:107b-12: dus gsum srid gsum sku gsung thugs la 'dus //
T02D2269:107b-13: gang la mi 'bad blang dor lta ba med //
T02D2269:107b-14: mtha' dbus mi 'byed dbu ma drang po'i lam //
T02D2269:107b-15: bcas bcos bral na thugs kyi lam mchog ste //
T02D2269:107b-16: bgrod 'jug rim sogs pha rol phyin pa'i lam //
T02D2269:107b-17: nye lam gzhag nas ring du 'khor ba'i rgyu //
T02D2269:107b-18: lhan cig skyes dang gnyen po 'gran zla bral //
T02D2269:107b-19: kho na nyid la sku bzhi ye shes lnga //
T02D2269:107b-20: nyon mongs la sogs tshogs pas 'khor ba'i lam //
T02D2269:107b-21: yul du gang skyes mi spyad yul med mthong //
T02D2269:107b-22: ngo bo nyid la dga' dang mi dga' med //
T02D2269:107b-23: 'dzin rtog gnyis bcas ma bcos chos kyi sku //
T02D2269:107b-24: dbang po rang yan ma zin stong par gnas //
T02D2269:107b-25: smrar med nyams su myong ba rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D2269:107b-26: rang gi rgyud la sbyar te shes par bya //
T02D2269:107b-27: dri ma med pa'i don la phyag rgya che / rgya mtshon ma mkha' lta bu'i nyams myong 'byung//
T02D2269:107b-28: dbang po yul bral ltung ba'i g-yang sa med //
T02D2269:107b-29: dran pas zin pas khyod nyid chags pa ste //
T02D2269:107b-30: rang btang gzhag pas spros pa slar la ldog /'char nub med na rnam rtog mun pa nub //
T02D2269:107b-31: chos nyid ro mnyam bud pa'i me tog mtshungs //
T02D2269:107b-32: skyon dang yon tan dbyer med nyid du mtshungs //
T02D2269:107b-33: ngo mtshar che ste nyams myong smrar ma gtub //
T02D2269:107b-34: bde ba dbyer med ji ltar chu gzhag bzhin //
T02D2269:107b-35: lhan cig skyes dang rnal 'byor de mi 'bral //
T02D2269:107b-36: dngos gcig bsam pa du mar dran mthong yang //
T02D2269:107b-37: dran med gcig yin du ma nyid du yin //
T02D2269:108a-2: rnal 'byor spyod pa blo las 'das par spyod //
T02D2269:108a-3: chags lam gnyug ma'i don la sbyor 'dod na //
T02D2269:108a-4: nang dang phyi rol ma dmigs bdag gzhan min //
T02D2269:108a-5: de nyid don shes rang bzhin grol bar bstan //
T02D2269:108a-6: sku gsum chos skur dbye ba med mod kyang //
T02D2269:108a-7: nyams su blangs na 'bras bu so so 'byung //
T02D2269:108a-8: kye ho dbyer med rtogs na lta ngan myur du 'joms //
T02D2269:108a-9: skye med stong pa dbyer med thug phrad don //
T02D2269:108a-10: yin par shes na nags 'dab rten dang bral //
T02D2269:108a-11: thug phrad ma shes mtshan ma'i snying rje ni //
T02D2269:108a-12: 'khor ba'i gnas su ci spyad zag pa'i rgyu //
T02D2269:108a-13: stong dang snying rje dbyer med skye ba med //
T02D2269:108a-14: gang zhig 'khor dang myang 'das ro dogs bral //
T02D2269:108a-15: lus sems ma rnyed dran med rang dgar gzhag / de nyid blo yis ma rnyed rang byung yin //
T02D2269:108a-16: mnyam gzhag rjes thob zhi gnas mtshan nyid de //
T02D2269:108a-17: don dam ma yin blo yis bsgom du med //
T02D2269:108a-18: lus ngang sems kyis gzugs sogs rtsol med gsal //
T02D2269:108a-19: sna rtse la sogs dbyibs dang nam mkha' dang //
T02D2269:108a-20: rtsa la reg par ma spyad gnyug mar gnas //
T02D2269:108a-21: snang ba thams cad bde ba yod mi byed //
T02D2269:108a-22: dran pa snang tsam sgyu mar shes tsam gsal //
T02D2269:108a-23: zla ba'i gzugs brnyan cha med gzung bas stong //
T02D2269:108a-24: btsal kyang med la bltas kyang mthong ba med //
T02D2269:108a-25: sgyu mar snang ba'i dran pa de dran te //
T02D2269:108a-26: dran pa med las cir yang mthong ba med //
T02D2269:108a-27: dran par snang yang de la 'dzin pa med //
T02D2269:108a-28: dran pas reg kyang reg gi bsam bral bas //
T02D2269:108a-29: bsam du med pas bral bas skye ba med //
T02D2269:108a-30: dran pa skyes kyang yul la mi spyod par //
T02D2269:108a-31: cir yang ma grub stong pa'i rang sor gzhag / ji ltar byas kyang phyag rgya rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D2269:108a-32: yan lag bzhi ldan phyag rgya chen po bzhi //
T02D2269:108a-33: skye med don rtogs pa yi yan lag dang //
T02D2269:108a-34: bden gnyis tha mi dad kyi yan lag dang //
T02D2269:108a-35: snang ba skye med thug phrad nyid du rtogs //
T02D2269:108a-36: dran pa gzung du med pa'i yan lag dang //
T02D2269:108a-37: stong pa rkyen dang dran med blo las 'das //
T02D2269:108a-38: dngos po dgag sgrub med pa'i yan lag go //
T02D2269:108b-0: de nyid gzhir ldan @108b 'dod pas dben pa dang //
T02D2269:108b-1: rtog pa dang bcas dpyod par bcas pa dang //
T02D2269:108b-2: dga' dang bde dang dben par gnas la sogs //
T02D2269:108b-3: tha snyad de nyid mtshon pa'i yul du gsungs //
T02D2269:108b-4: gzhir ldan rab 'bring tha mar gsungs pa yang //
T02D2269:108b-5: dman pa'i don du mkhas bas rab tu bshad //
T02D2269:108b-6: phyag rgya chen po gang la gnas mi byed //
T02D2269:108b-7: blang dor bral ba'i don du de zhin bshad //
T02D2269:108b-8: gtang smer mi 'byed gang yang dngos grub dag tu byed //
T02D2269:108b-9: lhan cig skyes dang yul la gtum mo sbar la sogs //
T02D2269:108b-10: dam tshig bdag gi kho na nyid dang rnal 'byor bsgom //
T02D2269:108b-11: dngos po thams cad mnyam nyid phyag rgya chen po la //
T02D2269:108b-12: rtog pa spang zhing mi rtog bsgom pa ci zhig 'gyur //
T02D2269:108b-13: bla ma la gus gsang ba'i 'dul sdom de ru rdzogs //
T02D2269:108b-14: phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang bskur so so'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02D2269:108b-15: bum pa gsang ba shes rab ye shes dang //
T02D2269:108b-16: ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba la sogs kun //
T02D2269:108b-17: thun mong mthu skyes phyag rgya che la reg mi nus //
T02D2269:108b-18: kye ho phyag rgya che la 'bras bu'i bdag nyid sku gsung thugs ldan pas //
T02D2269:108b-19: 'bras bu de yang snying po'i don la 'thad kyis drang dang nges pa'i don la min //
T02D2269:108b-20: lam dang 'bras bu'i snying po thams cad bcud bsdus dang //
T02D2269:108b-21: theg chen bla na med pa'i dngos dang theg pa dag gi khyad par dang //
T02D2269:108b-22: kun gyi snying por gyur nas gsang ba bla na med //
T02D2269:108b-23: phyag rgya chen po nges pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D2269:108b-24: dran dang dran med gnyis su med pas skye med de //
T02D2269:108b-25: blo las 'das shing nam mkha' lta bur cir mi gnas //
T02D2269:108b-26: las kyi phyag rgya dpe dang chos kyi phyag rgya'i lam //
T02D2269:108b-27: phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu dam tshig phyag rgya gzhan don te //
T02D2269:108b-28: chos kyi phyag rgya man chad bsten pas mthar mi 'gro //
T02D2269:108b-29: re dogs mthar lhung 'du 'dzin bya ba'i skyon du 'gyur //
T02D2269:108b-30: kho na nyid la gnyen po dbyer med rang sor
T02D2269:108b-31: gzhag / rnam rtog ji snyed shar yang lhug pa
T02D2269:108b-32: nyid la shar // dran pa rang sar grol nas dran med lhug pa nyid //
T02D2269:108b-33: gang yang longs spyod snang bar shes shing dran med gsos //
T02D2269:108b-34: rang bzhin nyams nyid skye med dag tu ldan //
T02D2269:109a-2: rgyun mi chad pa'i 'bab chu lta bu dang //
T02D2269:109a-3: mar me ltar gsal rang rig byang chub sems //
T02D2269:109a-4: 'gog pa med bzhin dran rig rang gis stong //
T02D2269:109a-5: yang dag kho na nyid ni gang zhe na //
T02D2269:109a-6: gzhan na yod na kun gyis mthong bar rigs //
T02D2269:109a-7: rang la yod kyang lkog gyur bla ma'i zhal //
T02D2269:109a-8: sems nyid sangs rgyas kho na nyid yin te //
T02D2269:109a-9: dran pas bslad cing de nyid gzhan du brtags //
T02D2269:109a-10: sangs rgyas yin phyir yon tan gang zhe na //
T02D2269:109a-11: yon tan ras dang dkar po lta bu ste //
T02D2269:109a-12: kho na nyid kyi yon tan phyag rgya che //
T02D2269:109a-13: ngo bo yon tan so so tha dad min //
T02D2269:109a-14: phyag rgya che dang bzhi pa la sogs kun //
T02D2269:109a-15: yon tan so so ma yin tha dad min //
T02D2269:109a-16: dran med yon tan rgya mtsho ma 'gul bar //
T02D2269:109a-17: dran par mi 'gyur chu yi dba' rlabs med //
T02D2269:109a-18: skye med yon tan mi 'gyur brag dang 'dra //
T02D2269:109a-19: brag ca grag tsam rjes su 'brang ba med //
T02D2269:109a-20: blo yis 'das shing yul du ma gyur pa //
T02D2269:109a-21: phyag rgya chen po'i yon tan nam mkha' 'dra //
T02D2269:109a-22: dran pa sems can sems las byung ba yin //
T02D2269:109a-23: de phyir stong pa gzhan nas btsal mi dgos //
T02D2269:109a-24: bzhi ru snang yang gcig gi yon tan ni //
T02D2269:109a-25: phyag rgya bzhi ru snang ba ci phyir mtshon //
T02D2269:109a-26: gong gi khyad par dag gi bzhi ru byung //
T02D2269:109a-27: phyag rgya chen po gsum du rtog mi byed //
T02D2269:109a-28: gang la mi gnas chags pa med par spyod //
T02D2269:109a-29: me tog sbrang rtsi sbrang mas 'thung dang 'dra //
T02D2269:109a-30: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thabs yin te //
T02D2269:109a-31: ro dang phrad na ro la zhen pa med //
T02D2269:109a-32: de ltar kun gyis shes par 'gyur ma yin //
T02D2269:109a-33: snying po'i don gyi 'gro drug khyab mod kyang //
T02D2269:109a-34: 'gro ba dran pas bcings te pad tra'i srin //
T02D2269:109a-35: sems las dran pa byung phyir 'khrul pa'i rgyu //
T02D2269:109a-36: yid la mi byed shes na sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D2269:109a-37: 'khrul pa de la thabs dang shes rab med //
T02D2269:109a-38: kye ho dbyer med shes na thabs mchog de kho na //
T02D2269:109a-39: sangs rgyas sems can chos rnams thams cad kun //
T02D2269:109a-40: rang gi sems nyid dag dang lhan cig skyes //
T02D2269:109a-41: yid la mi byed yid la skyes tsam na //
T02D2269:109a-42: dran pa'i snang ba nub ste bden brdzun med //
T02D2269:109b-0: de phyir de nyid kho na'i yul @109b ma yin //
T02D2269:109b-1: dper na mig gi yul du sgra mi snang //
T02D2269:109b-2: rnam par mi rtog rtog pa'i yul ma yin //
T02D2269:109b-3: stong pa'i rkyen gyis dran pa gsal tsam na //
T02D2269:109b-4: dran pa'i snang ba nub nas mthong ba med //
T02D2269:109b-5: ye shes 'on long lkugs par mi 'gyur te //
T02D2269:109b-6: ma dran pa la 'on long lkugs rgyu med //
T02D2269:109b-7: bems po la sogs tha snyad kun dang bral //
T02D2269:109b-8: snang ba nub ces bya ba'i tha snyad ni //
T02D2269:109b-9: dran pa phyag te dran med gsos su spungs //
T02D2269:109b-10: de nyid skye med blo las 'das pa ni //
T02D2269:109b-11: dran pa med dang skye med ye shes mes //
T02D2269:109b-12: gzung 'dzin bsregs sbyangs blo las 'das phul bas //
T02D2269:109b-13: smon lam dbang gis skye ba phyis mi brgyud //
T02D2269:109b-14: de phyir phyag rgya chen po sdon song la //
T02D2269:109b-15: su la mi brten gang la rag ma lus //
T02D2269:109b-16: chu la zhugs dang tshogs dang za 'gyed byed //
T02D2269:109b-17: rig byed grong khyer dkrog pa dag dang mtshungs //
T02D2269:109b-18: phyag rgya chen po rang las gzhan med phyir //
T02D2269:109b-19: mchod rdzas dran pa mgron dang mchod gnas rang shes pas //
T02D2269:109b-20: mchod pa rang gi dran pa med la mchod //
T02D2269:109b-21: blo las 'das kyi skye med tshogs la rol //
T02D2269:109b-22: phyag rgya chen po gzhan la mi ltos phyir //
T02D2269:109b-23: bsgom bya rang la sgom byed rang gi sems //
T02D2269:109b-24: blo 'das rang la dmigs pa nyid dang bral//
T02D2269:109b-25: de nyid 'bras bu yin phyir gzhan la rag ma lus //
T02D2269:109b-26: bsgom bsgrub sngags bzlas rang gi sems yin te //
T02D2269:109b-27: yi dam lha dang rang gi sems yin pas //
T02D2269:109b-28: de phyir mkha' 'gro lung ston la sogs rang gi sems //
T02D2269:109b-29: sems ni dran pa cir yang snang bar ston //
T02D2269:109b-30: ma dran pa la thams cad dmigs su med //
T02D2269:109b-31: phyag rgya chen po rang las gzhan med phyir //
T02D2269:109b-32: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la sogs te //
T02D2269:109b-33: pha ma dkon mchog rang bzhin byang chub sems //
T02D2269:109b-34: mchod dang bsnyen bkur byas na dran pa'i rgyu //
T02D2269:109b-35: tha dad med na skye med rang sar grol //
T02D2269:109b-36: blo las 'das na bya dang mi bya med //
T02D2269:109b-37: sangs rgyas sems can mtshon tshul so so yang //
T02D2269:109b-38: lhan cig dag tu skyes te rig ma rig /
T02D2269:109b-39: gang zhig snang yang dran pa ra mi rtog na
T02D2269:109b-40: // sems can nyid ni 'bras bu skye ba med //
T02D2269:109b-41: gang zhig mi snang dran par rtog ce na //
T02D2269:110a-2: gang zhig dran med yid la 'chang byed ci //
T02D2269:110a-3: sems can snang yang sangs rgyas dag dang mtshungs //
T02D2269:110a-4: gang zhig dran pa sangs rgyas rtogs 'dod na //
T02D2269:110a-5: sangs rgyas snang yang sems can khyad par med //
T02D2269:110a-6: des na snang brtags gnyis la brtag tu med de bor //
T02D2269:110a-7: bor yang rang las gzhan med 'gro rgyun 'chad //
T02D2269:110a-8: rang las yod snyam rtog ge dran pas bslad //
T02D2269:110a-9: snang ba gsal la mi rtog ma zhen sems //
T02D2269:110a-10: de phyir yod dang med pa'i rtog pa gnyis bral te //
T02D2269:110a-11: gnyug mar gnas na gang ltar byas kyang bde //
T02D2269:110a-12: dran pa 'dod gsal 'dzin pa'i snying po can //
T02D2269:110a-13: zhen pa gnyis dang bral te rang bzhin gnyug mar
T02D2269:110a-14: gzhag / des na phyag rgya chen po zung du
T02D2269:110a-15: rab 'jug ste // dran pa dran med skye med
T02D2269:110a-16: zung du 'jug / dran med mi rtog pa yi
T02D2269:110a-17: rab 'jug ste // rang bzhin dang // rten 'brel glo bur skye ba'i dran pa gnyis //
T02D2269:110a-18: skye ba med pa'i ngang du ro gcig phyir //
T02D2269:110a-19: des na skye dang skye ba blo las 'das //
T02D2269:110a-20: 'od gsal stong dang zung du 'jug la sogs //
T02D2269:110a-21: ma bcos ma byas skye med rang sar grol //
T02D2269:110a-22: de la sku gsum chos sku longs sku dang //
T02D2269:110a-23: sna tshogs snang ba sprul sku zhes su bshad //
T02D2269:110a-24: gnyug ma ngo bo nyid kyi sku yin te //
T02D2269:110a-25: snying rje stong dang dbyer med skye ba med //
T02D2269:110a-26: las kyi phyag rgyal brten nyams myong ni //
T02D2269:110a-27: bcos ma yin phyir rkyen gyi stobs las byung //
T02D2269:110a-28: gzhan la ltos phyir kho na nyid ma yin //
T02D2269:110a-29: chos kyi phyag rgya bcos ma ma yin kyang //
T02D2269:110a-30: nyams su myong bas ma grub nyid mi mthong //
T02D2269:110a-31: phyag rgya chen po nyams su myong 'gyur na //
T02D2269:110a-32: dran pa sna tshogs skye ba med par shes //
T02D2269:110a-33: dngos por snang ba ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
T02D2269:110a-34: sems can skye ba med dang dbyer med don //
T02D2269:110a-35: snying rje thabs kyis mtshon bya dpe yis bstan //
T02D2269:110a-36: sna tshogs snang yang blo 'das yul mi g-yo //
T02D2269:110a-37: bdag nyid rnal 'byor de nyid rtag tu blta //
T02D2269:110a-38: spyod lam thams cad phyag rgya che la gnas //
T02D2269:110a-39: dngos po'i gnas lugs skye med dang du gzhag / rlung gi rkyen bcas rgya mtsho dang ba la //
T02D2269:110b-0: dba' @110b rlabs chu yi gnyer ma glo bur skye //
T02D2269:110b-1: de nyid rgya mtsho dag dang dbyer med do //
T02D2269:110b-2: dran pas rkyen byas rtog pa glo bur skye //
T02D2269:110b-3: de nyid sngar gyi dran pa med dang ni //
T02D2269:110b-4: skye med blo 'das ngag gis ngo mtshar mtshungs //
T02D2269:110b-5: de ltar phyag rgya che la skyes pa sngar med bzhin //
T02D2269:110b-6: phyis kyang rkyen gyi stobs kyis skyes srid kyang //
T02D2269:110b-7: skye ba med pa de dag dbyer med do //
T02D2269:110b-8: gzugs can ma yin kun la khyab pa dang //
T02D2269:110b-9: mi 'gyur ba dang dus rnams thams cad pa'o //
T02D2269:110b-10: nam mkha' lta bur skye 'gag med pa dang //
T02D2269:110b-11: thag pa sbrul bzung sbrul gyi stong pa dang //
T02D2269:110b-12: chos sku longs sku sprul sku dbyer med de //
T02D2269:110b-13: ngo bo nyid ni blo yi yul las 'das //
T02D2269:110b-14: phyag rgya chen po skad cig mngon sangs rgyas //
T02D2269:110b-15: de nyid sems can don du gzugs skur byung //
T02D2269:110b-16: rgyu mthun 'bras bu rnam smin 'bras bu dang //
T02D2269:110b-17: dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu gzhan don byed ;
T02D2269:110b-18: / go 'phang khyad par brjod las 'das par bshad //
T02D2269:110b-19: kye ho ma bcos phyag rgya bde ba che //
T02D2269:110b-20: dran med klong du rang shar ba //
T02D2269:110b-21: skye med nam mkha' lta bur khyab //
T02D2269:110b-22: blo las 'das pa'i ngang la gnas //
T02D2269:110b-23: snang ba spros bral ba de ba che //
T02D2269:110b-24: dran med cir yang mi rtog pa //
T02D2269:110b-25: dran pa sna tshogs sems su gsal //
T02D2269:110b-26: brtag cing btsal na dmigs su med //
T02D2269:110b-27: skye ba med pa 'dzin dang bral //
T02D2269:110b-28: 'dzin dang bral ba'i rgyu ba med //
T02D2269:110b-29: dran pa sgyu ma rang rig tsam //
T02D2269:110b-30: sgyu med thar med dran med gsal //
T02D2269:110b-31: skye med don dam kun gsal bas //
T02D2269:110b-32: thams cad blo las 'das par snang //
T02D2269:110b-33: khams gsum blo 'das ye shes nyid //
T02D2269:110b-34: lhan cig skyes pa de kho na //
T02D2269:110b-35: dran pa'i rtsa ba ma lus thag bcad do //
T02D2269:110b-36: dran med skye ba med pa'i dbyings la dgod //
T02D2269:110b-37: de nyid ma bcos blo yi yul las 'das //
T02D2269:110b-38: dran rig sems kyi rang 'bar nyid du gsal //
T02D2269:110b-39: gsal bas rnam rtog 'khor ba'i grogs su 'gyur //
T02D2269:110b-40: thar pa'i lam ni kho na nyid shes nas //
T02D2269:110b-41: rang 'byung ji bzhin bsam bral ngang la gnas //
T02D2269:110b-42: dran pa rang gsal dngos por grub pa med //
T02D2269:110b-43: bcos med dgongs pa skye med bde chen 'di //
T02D2269:111a-2: dran med yul du cir yang mthong ba med //
T02D2269:111a-3: rten dang bral bas slob pa gang yang med //
T02D2269:111a-4: gang la yid la byar med phyag rgya che //
T02D2269:111a-5: mtshan ma'i dran rig sna tshogs ji snyed pa //
T02D2269:111a-6: de nyid phyag rgya che la dbye ba med //
T02D2269:111a-7: rtogs dang mi rtogs gnyi ga so so min //
T02D2269:111a-8: rtag chad mtha' la mi gnas skyon dang bral //
T02D2269:111a-9: rang gi de nyid rtogs na gzhan las min //
T02D2269:111a-10: rten 'brel mya ngan 'das lam bstan pa dang //
T02D2269:111a-11: skye ba med par rtogs na phyag rgya che //
T02D2269:111a-12: de nyid mi shes las kyi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2269:111a-13: dam tshig chos la sogs pa rtsol 'dod pa //
T02D2269:111a-14: de nyid mtshon ba'i dpe tsam don mi nus //
T02D2269:111a-15: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyag rgya che brten pa //
T02D2269:111a-16: shes pa rang lugs so ma nyid la byung //
T02D2269:111a-17: 'dod med rang gzhan gnyug ma'i ngo bor gnas //
T02D2269:111a-18: tha mal snang ba'i shes pa 'di nyid blo //
T02D2269:111a-19: yin min dran pa'i sems la rang gzhag yin //
T02D2269:111a-20: yid ches rin chen gdams ngag yid bzhin gter //
T02D2269:111a-21: yid la bya dang mi bya med par gzhag / rang rig phyag rgya chen po nyid yin pas //
T02D2269:111a-22: phyag rgya chen po nyid la nyid kyis bstan //
T02D2269:111a-23: dran pa sna tshogs don la sems ma 'jug / phyi nang bral bas rtsod med phyag rgya dang ;
T02D2269:111a-24: / phyag rgya chen po srog ldan 'dod pa med //
T02D2269:111a-25: 'dod pa byung na de yang dran pa'i rgyu //
T02D2269:111a-26: rang sems phyag rgya chen po la //
T02D2269:111a-27: dran dang ma dran tha dang skye pa med //
T02D2269:111a-28: 'khrul dang ma 'khrul blo yi yul las 'das //
T02D2269:111a-29: dran pa'i zhen rtogs brtas pas 'khor ba'i rgyu //
T02D2269:111a-30: 'od gsal phyag rgya chen po gnyug ma'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2269:111a-31: gang yang 'gyur med byang chub sems su gcig / kho na nyid la gzung 'dzin ngo bo bral //
T02D2269:111a-32: snang ba don ldan ye shes nyid du mthong //
T02D2269:111a-33: bsam pas brtags pas dran pa'i tshogs su rgyus //
T02D2269:111a-34: snang ba skye ba log pa'i stobs kyis mthong //
T02D2269:111a-35: dran pa dran med ngang la shes 'jug pa //
T02D2269:111a-36: lus ngag yid kyis 'bad kyang dran rgyu med //
T02D2269:111a-37: gnyis su med na 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med //
T02D2269:111a-38: dran pa sna tshogs 'gyu ba'i rang bzhin 'di //
T02D2269:111a-39: sna rtse'i phyag rgya dag la ye nas med //
T02D2269:111a-40: des na phyag rgya chen po bsam med blang dor
T02D2269:111b-0: @111b gzhag / kye ho phyi nang zab dang mi
T02D2269:111b-2: yongs grub ngo bo nyid dang dbugs dbyung dang //
T02D2269:111b-3: rgyas gdab las dang chos kyi phyag rgya ni //
T02D2269:111b-4: rnal 'byor yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste //
T02D2269:111b-5: phyag rgya chen po ngo bo nyid kyi rim //
T02D2269:111b-6: dam tshig phyag rgya yongs su grub pa'i rim ;
T02D2269:111b-7: / kun brtags yongs su grub pa'i rgya //
T02D2269:111b-8: las kyi phyag rgya dbang gi ngo bo dang //
T02D2269:111b-9: dga' ba bzhi ldan thabs kyi rang bzhin can //
T02D2269:111b-10: chos kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs snang ba ste //
T02D2269:111b-11: dga' bzhi'i lhan cig skyes pa nyid //
T02D2269:111b-12: phyag rgya chen po skye ba med pa la //
T02D2269:111b-13: gzung 'dzin dran bra la ngo bo blo las 'das //
T02D2269:111b-14: dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu mngon sangs rgyas //
T02D2269:111b-15: dam tshig phyag rgya mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor te //
T02D2269:111b-16: 'bras bu lha yi dkyil 'khor 'gro ba'i don //
T02D2269:111b-17: rje btsun pha ma thabs dang shes rab mtshon //
T02D2269:111b-18: dga' ba bzhi ldan dam tshig phyag rgya che //
T02D2269:111b-19: de ltar thabs kyi sbyor ba kun 'dul yang //
T02D2269:111b-20: zab mo chos kyi phyag rgyas gtan la dbab //
T02D2269:111b-21: sems nyid phyag rgya chen po rang la bstan //
T02D2269:111b-22: dga' bas gzung ba'i dran pa bkar ba dang //
T02D2269:111b-23: mchog dgas 'dzin pa'i dran phyed gtang ba dang //
T02D2269:111b-24: lhan cig skyes dags dran pa bkar bas dang //
T02D2269:111b-25: dga' bral snang ba skye med dran pa gsal //
T02D2269:111b-26: de bzhin zab mo'i chos kyi phyag rgya bstan //
T02D2269:111b-27: dga' bzhi ye shes gang du skyes pa dang //
T02D2269:111b-28: tha mi dad cing yongs su thim par gnas //
T02D2269:111b-29: rtog pa'i nyams myong dag la gnas pa dang //
T02D2269:111b-30: yid la ma dran rtog pa tha mi dad //
T02D2269:111b-31: dpe dang lam ste tha snyad 'dul bar bstan //
T02D2269:111b-32: sems nyid phyag rgya chen po 'char ba ni //
T02D2269:111b-33: skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul cir yang 'char //
T02D2269:111b-34: blo las 'das pas ma skyes ngo bor bstan //
T02D2269:111b-35: ma skyes pa dang skyes pa'i dngos po gnyis //
T02D2269:111b-36: tha dad med de gnyug ma'i ngo bor gzhag / dran pa sna tshogs gang la rgyu ba 'di //
T02D2269:111b-37: dran med 'jug pas rtog pa mi 'gag pa //
T02D2269:111b-38: shes pa rang lugs bzhag na gnas par 'gyur //
T02D2269:111b-39: snang dang stong dang gnyis 'dzin skye ba'i rgyu //
T02D2269:111b-40: tha mi dad par go na bde ba che //
T02D2269:111b-41: nyams myong shar bas mi mthun 'dzin pa bral //
T02D2269:111b-42: dran pa med de 'di 'dra'i yul med pa //
T02D2269:112a-1: med dang snang stong tha mi dad //
T02D2269:112a-2: ma skyes mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor la //
T02D2269:112a-3: mnyam gzhag rjes thob med de rgyun gyi rnal 'byor la //
T02D2269:112a-4: snang dang skye ba dran pa gang skyes kyang //
T02D2269:112a-5: de nyid stong pa dran pa med gnas pas //
T02D2269:112a-6: dran pa yid la byar med snang stong dbyer mi phyed //
T02D2269:112a-7: de nyid thug phrad skye med nyams myong la //
T02D2269:112a-8: snang ba'i ngo bo stong pa bde chen shar //
T02D2269:112a-9: chab ro ma chur bzhu btung du btub bzhin du //
T02D2269:112a-10: gang snang skye med bde ba chen por tshor //
T02D2269:112a-11: btang snyoms dran pa med de rtog pa ma bkag kyang //
T02D2269:112a-12: blo las 'das bas rmongs pa sgom dang bral //
T02D2269:112a-13: 'di la gnas na bde chen nyams 'byung ste //
T02D2269:112a-14: dang por snang ba stong pa'i nyams myong 'byung //
T02D2269:112a-15: chab rom snang yang chu ngo shes bzhin du //
T02D2269:112a-16: gnyis pa dran pa'i snang ba ma 'gag par //
T02D2269:112a-17: stong pa bde dang tha mi dad par 'byung //
T02D2269:112a-18: chab rom chu ru bzhu ba'i gnas skabs bzhin //
T02D2269:112a-19: dran pa dran med skye ba med la thim //
T02D2269:112a-20: thams cad tha mi dad pas bde ba chen por
T02D2269:112a-21: gcig / de nyid chab rom chu ru bzhu ba
T02D2269:112a-22: bzhin // thams cad rang bzhin thug phrad shes gyur na //
T02D2269:112a-23: bcing bkrol dag gis ma bzung dran pa'i rjes ma 'brang //
T02D2269:112a-24: 'jur bus bcings pa bzhin du sems mi sgrib //
T02D2269:112a-25: 'jur bu klod na grol zhing sems nyid gar dgar btang //
T02D2269:112a-26: ldog pas gzings la 'phur ba'i bya rog bzhin //
T02D2269:112a-27: de nyid shes na snang ba longs spyod yin //
T02D2269:112a-28: lcags kyus btab pas glang chen thim pa bzhin //
T02D2269:112a-29: bya bral bzhag pas glang chen lom ba bzhin //
T02D2269:112a-30: dran pa dran med ngo shes gnod pa med //
T02D2269:112a-31: snang dang stong pa shes pas rtog dang bral //
T02D2269:112a-32: skye bar gnas pas dbyer med dran mi rgyu //
T02D2269:112a-33: de nyid khyab bdag dgra kun ngo shes bzhin //
T02D2269:112a-34: snang ba stong par thim pas lan tshva chur thim bzhin //
T02D2269:112a-35: dran pa dran med thim pa de kho na //
T02D2269:112a-36: skye ba rnam pa gnyis la skye rgyu med //
T02D2269:112a-37: thug phrad skye med ye shes shar bas na //
T02D2269:112a-38: dran pa blo yi yul med phyogs med ye shes 'char //
T02D2269:112a-39: spra ba me mched rang 'bar me bzhin du //
T02D2269:112b-0: nyams myong smrar mi btub pa gzhon nu'i bde ba @112b bzhi na //
T02D2269:112b-1: sna tshogs snang yang dran par mi 'gyur ba //
T02D2269:112b-2: dal ba'i 'bab chu sa dba' rlabs mi 'gyur bas //
T02D2269:112b-3: rang gi ngo bo gsal bas mar me dran //
T02D2269:112b-4: de ltar phyag rgya chen po gang la mi bstan pas //
T02D2269:112b-5: bya sar ko ne mkha' la gnas bzhin du //
T02D2269:112b-6: rtogs pa'i spyod pas blang dor mi byed pa //
T02D2269:112b-7: srog chags pa ta ri bzhin zhen chags med //
T02D2269:112b-8: blo 'das 'bras bu 'dod na med grub pa //
T02D2269:112b-9: sman mchog nang na pe ta ji bzhin nyid //
T02D2269:112b-10: kye ho de ltar mkhas pa thabs zin dag gis ni //
T02D2269:112b-11: dran pa med pa skye med rgyas btab ste //
T02D2269:112b-12: dran pa med pas dran med rgya yis btab //
T02D2269:112b-13: snang bas stong pa la rgyas gdab //
T02D2269:112b-14: stong bas snang ba la rgyas gdab //
T02D2269:112b-15: dran dang snang ba bde ba'i ror shar na //
T02D2269:112b-16: stong dang dran med rgya yis thebs pa yin //
T02D2269:112b-17: snang dang dran pa stong pa'i rgya dang ni //
T02D2269:112b-18: dran med gnas pa dag gis rgyas gdab na //
T02D2269:112b-19: snang dang dran pa bde ba'i ror shar nas //
T02D2269:112b-20: mtshan ma'i bsgom pas ma dpyad mtshan ma'i blo las 'das //
T02D2269:112b-21: dran dang snang ba dag la skye med rgyas btab pa //
T02D2269:112b-22: skye med dag la blo 'das rgya yis thebs //
T02D2269:112b-23: dran pas dran med bde ba'i rgyas thebs pas //
T02D2269:112b-24: stong par ma song chad pa'i mthar ma lhung//
T02D2269:112b-25: gnas pa skye ba dag la rgyas thebs pas //
T02D2269:112b-26: dngos por ma song rtag pa'i mthar ma lhung //
T02D2269:112b-27: thams cad blo las 'das shing skye ba med //
T02D2269:112b-28: thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgyu dang ldan //
T02D2269:112b-29: de ltar shes pas btang snyoms mthar ma lhung //
T02D2269:112b-30: dran pa 'khor ba'i dngos po dang //
T02D2269:112b-31: dran pa med pa'i rtogs pa la //
T02D2269:112b-32: btang snyoms lam du khyer bar byed pa dang //
T02D2269:112b-33: rig pas gzhigs nas stong pa btang snyoms dang //
T02D2269:112b-34: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang rig btang snyoms pas //
T02D2269:112b-35: bden pa gnyis bral gnyis med btang snyoms bsgom //
T02D2269:112b-36: gang du ma dran bsam gtan btang snyoms mchog / lung du ma bstan btang snyoms sgom ma yin //
T02D2269:112b-37: shes pa sor gzhag dran med nyams 'phro ba //
T02D2269:112b-38: dran pa'i mtshan ma dran med lam du khyer //
T02D2269:112b-39: bde ba lam khyer blo 'das ma dmigs pa //
T02D2269:112b-40: gnyis la mi rtog bde ba rgyun ma 'chad //
T02D2269:113a-0: @113a * // kye ho nyams dang bral bas gzung 'dzin gnyis las grol //
T02D2269:113a-1: de nyid phyag rgya chen po'i don mthong 'gyur //
T02D2269:113a-2: 'bras bu mthar thug rin chen gter chen la //
T02D2269:113a-3: phyag rgya che la gnas su 'dod gang //
T02D2269:113a-4: dri med 'bras bu rtogs par shog / sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa //
